subject: Auth error banners not announced to screen readers
description: Login/Register error banners are plain divs with no role="alert"/aria-live, and inputs are not marked aria-invalid or linked to the error message. Add aria-live="assertive" or role="alert", set aria-invalid on relevant inputs, and connect via aria-describedby. Files: packages/web/src/components/auth/login-form.tsx:36-65, register-form.tsx:49-104.
